title: Were the requests for the deployment of the National Guard initially denied during the Capitol riot?
subtitle: The law enforcement agencies were criticized for their slow response to the chaos at the American Capitol Building in Washington, D.C.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: The Ministry of Defence initially rejected a request from the capital's officials to deploy the National Guard to the United States Capitol because it had been breached by a pro-Trap gang seeking to prevent the ratification of the 2020 presidential election.
